scripts.invoke:update-timetable: npm run build && sls invoke local --function updateTimetable
scripts.invoke:update-hvv-request: npm run build && sls invoke local --function hvvRequest
scripts.invoke:update-create-user: npm run build && sls invoke local --function createUser
scripts.invoke:update-check-timetable: npm run build && sls invoke local --function checkTimetable
